start.text: You are Justin the Beaver, standing at the edge of a still pond. The wilderness stretches out before you, filled with opportunities and dangers. What will you do?

forest.text: You are in a dense forest. The trees tower above you.

choices.text: Go south back to the starting point.

river.text: You are by a rushing river. The sound of water fills the air.

choices.text: Go west back to the starting point.

deep_forest.text: You venture deeper into the forest, where the trees grow taller and the sounds of wildlife surround you. You feel a sense of adventure.

upstream.text: You follow the river upstream and find a small waterfall.

choices.text: Go downstream back to the river.
